MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES
BUREAU OF CHILDREN AND ADULT LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CB820201212
Licensee Name: Judson Center
Licensee Address: 4410 W 13 Mile Road
Royal Oak, MI 480736515
Licensee Telephone #: (248) 549-4339
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Marn Myers, Designee
Name of Facility: Judson CPA
Facility Address: 12723 Telegraph Rd., Suite 200
Redford, MI 48239
Facility Telephone #: (313) 794-5653
Capacity:
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, PRIVATE
1

Purpose of Addendum
The agency requested to move their existing license from the location at 23750
Elmira, Suite 103 in Redford to a new location at 12723 Telegraph, Suite 200 in
Redford.
Methodology
A site visit was conducted on 3/26/2008.
Physical Description of Facility
The new office is located on the second floor of a two-story building that is shared
with other businesses. There is ample security and parking in the front of the
building. Restrooms are handicap-assessable. The office encompasses 8760 sq.
ft., which includes one large and three small visiting rooms. The staff members are
housed in offices and cubicles, and there are large work stations for telecommuters.
There is a large multi-purpose room and smaller conference room for meetings. The
files are organized in moveable cabinets and stored in a large lockable room
equipped with a sprinkler system.
Recommendation
I recommend issuance of a regular license for the Judson Center CPA as relocated
to Telegraph Rd. in Redford from its previously licensed site on Elmira Rd. in
Redford.
April 1, 2008
________________________________________
Deborah M. Perry Date
Licensing Consultant
2
